resources.string: Zählen Sie die Finger, die nicht gebogen sind, und drücken Sie die entsprechende Zahl..
DE Find the figure of the model on the left in one of the shadow images on the right side of it and press it.
DE One of the four pictures does not fit the others. Find it and press it.
DE Find the three identical buttons. Press them and after that press the "check" button.(You don not have a chance for undo if a button is pressed.)
DE Count the toes, which ARE folded and press the corresponding button.
Positionieren Sie den Teil des Bildes durch die zahlen "von unten".
Positionieren Sie den Teil des Bildes durch die zahlen "von unten".
DE Remember the pictures that will be displayed on the next page. After 30 seconds will be shown another page. Click on the pictures you remembered.
DE What is the time? Choose the correct answer.
DE The two images on the left have a relation. Find one of the couples on the right, which two pictures have the same relation.
Suchen Sie eine Zahl, die versteckt unter den verschlungenen Linien und wählen Sie die richtige Antwort.
Finden Sie alle Quadrate und klicken Sie auf die entsprechende Nummer.
Ratet mal, was muss die nächste Zahl.
DE What picture from the board corresponds to the picture below? Choose the corresponding number.(See the example below)
DE For the construction of a cube requires 8(eight) bricks. How many bricks must be added to complete cubes.
DE How many blocks includes in the figure. Press the corresponding button
DE Click on the group of three digits in which the middle digit is lower than the other two, and skip all other groups.
DE Приложението \"БГ ученик\" е сбор от упражнения за деца в предучилищна възраст , които развиват всички основни познавателни способности - мислене, внимание, памет, въображение, и др.\n
